name: Lucky Wheel Happy Color Brain Game
name_original: Lucky Wheel Happy Color Brain Game
description:
Lucky Wheel - Happy Color Brain Game
Control the finger point to true color on color wheel.

Lucky Wheel - Happy Colorl is a free game with a color circle or color wheel and a finger. The finger always spin round color circle change divert after you tap on true color. The finger will be speed up spinning after you tap on true color.

How to play Color Lucky Wheel - Happy Color

Your job is combining your brain and your finger to matching the finger with the true color. That is so easy at the first time but It will make you crazy quickly when finger speed up.

Share your high score and challenge your friends.
